TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Benjee10's Historical Kerbal Suits | Custom Space Suits & Space Helmets - Apollo, ACES, Sokol & more! | [Orion suit!] | v1.1.0

Articles.Content:
I say it would be nice to have a Benjee10's Sci-Fi Kerbal Suits mod. It'd be amazing to have spacesuits from For All Mankind, Interstellar, The Martian, all the good ones in KSP. It'd probably not fit in with this mod since its Historical Spacesuits, but I think it would be nice to have Benjee style sci-fi suits.

Edited September 24, 2023 by TwoCalories
